title: M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Hourly Series - 50 Percent
description: This is a variation of the M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Hourly Seriesdataset. In this variation, 50% of the latest epochs from the original timeseries are retained. This dataset is a curated collection of 35 unique hourly time series, each with a length of 748 data points, sampled from the diverse and comprehensive series presented in the M4 forecasting competition. Encompassing a range of domains including finance, retail, and energy, these uni-variate series are selected for their variety and the richness they offer to hourly frequency forecasting tasks, despite originating from non-uniform time windows.
